data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Anand do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Anand, Gujarat, India
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 23,020 believers in Anand, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 23,020 believers in Anand.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the county of Anand to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Shenva (Hindu traditions) people might believe through him.
Jesus, make yourself known to the 2,092,700 people living in Anand through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church of Anand, Gujarat, India that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.section_summary:
the county of Anand, Gujarat, India has a population of 2,092,700.

We estimate Anand has 23,020 people who might know Jesus, 25,391 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 2,044,289 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 2,044,289 lost people in  Anand, Gujarat, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

location.name: Anand
location.people_groups_list: Shemalia, Khalpa, Sathwara, Gandharb (Muslim traditions), Gadhai
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Shemalia (2,800), Khalpa (118,000), Sathwara (68,000), Gandharb (Muslim traditions) (5,500), Gadhai (100)
